amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-477 to prohibit the Department of the Interior from creating a new Special Area or expanding an existing Special Areas within the NPR-A, without specific Congressional authorization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
